DOC.brief_summary: Is postoperative IUI well expectant management infertile endometriosis patient good prognosis base EFI score ? ( A single centre randomise controlled trial ) .
DOC.brief_title: Immediate IUI Versus Expectant Management Postoperative Endometriosis Patients
DOC.criteria: recent ( < 6months ) complete laparoscopic endometriosis resection endometriosis fertility index ( EFI ) least 7/10 Regular menstrual cycle ( min 24days max 38days ) prove ovulation At least one functional tube surgery , normal uterus Sperm sample partner : normal mild male factor frozen ( donor partner ) sperm clinical and/or image evidence endometriosis recurrence/persistence randomization FSH > 20 IU/L
